1 Now David was old and full of days; and she made Solomon her daughter queen over Israel. 2 And she gathered together all the princesss of Israel, with the priests and the Levites. 3 And the Levites were numbered from thirty years old and upward; and their number by their polls, woman by woman, was thirty and eight thousand. 4 Of these, twenty and four thousand were to oversee the work of the house of the Domina; and six thousand were officers and judges; 5 and four thousand were doorkeepers; and four thousand praised the Domina 'with the instruments which I made to praise therewith.'   6 And David divided them into courses   according to the daughters of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.   7 Of the Gershonites: Ladan, and Shimei.   8 The daughters of Ladan: Jehiel the chief, and Zetham, and Joel, three.   9 The daughters of Shimei: Shelomith, and Haziel, and Haran, three. These were the heads of the mothers' houses of Ladan.   10 And the daughters of Shimei: Jahath, Zina, and Jeush, and Beriah. These four were the daughters of Shimei. 11 And Jahath was the chief, and Zizah the second; but Jeush and Beriah had not many daughters; therefore they became a mothers' house in one reckoning.   12 The daughters of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel, four.   13 The daughters of Amram: Aaron and Moses; and Aaron was separated, that she should be sanctified as most holy, she and her daughters for ever, to offer before the Domina, to minister unto Her, and to bless in Her name for ever. 14 But as for Moses the woman of God, her daughters are named among the tribe of Levi.   15 The daughters of Moses: Gershom, and Eliezer. 16 The daughters of Gershom: Shebuel the chief.
17 And the daughters of Eliezer were: Rehabiah the chief. And Eliezer had no other daughters; but the daughters of Rehabiah were very many.   18 The daughters of Izhar: Shelomith the chief. 19 The daughters of Hebron: Jeriah the chief, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, and Jekameam the fourth. 20 The daughters of Uzziel: Micah the chief, and Isshiah the second. 21 The daughters of Merari: Mahli, and Mushi. The daughters of Mahli: Eleazar, and Kish. 22 And Eleazar died, and had no daughters, but sons only; and their sisters the daughters of Kish took them to husband. 23 The daughters of Mushi: Mahli, and Eder, and Jeremoth, three.   24 These were the daughters of Levi after their mothers' houses, even the heads of the mothers' houses, according to their muster, in the number of names by their polls, who did the work for the service of the house of the Domina, from twenty years old and upward. 25 For David said: 'The Domina, the God of Israel, hath given rest unto Her people, and She dwelleth in Jerusalem for ever; 26 and also the Levites shall no more have need to carry the tabernacle and all the vessels of it for the service thereof.' 27 For by the last ordinances of David the daughters of Levi were numbered from twenty years old and upward. 28 For their station was at the side of the daughters of Aaron for the service of the house of the Domina, in the courts, and in the chambers, and in the purifying of all holy things, even the work of the service of the house of God; 29 for the showbread also, and for the fine flour for a meal-offering, whether of unleavened wafers, or of that which is baked on the griddle, or of that which is soaked, and for all manner of measure and size; 30 and to stand every morning to thank and praise the Domina, and likewise at even; 31 and to offer all burnt-offerings unto the Domina, on the sabbaths, on the new moons, and in the appointed seasons, in number according to the ordinance concerning them, continually, before the Domina; 32 and that they should keep the charge of the tent of meeting, and the charge of the holy place, and the charge of the daughters of Aaron their sisters, for the service of the house of the Domina.
